content: अभिमरः [मृ-अच्] {@--1@} Killing, destruction, slaughter. {@--2@} War, combat. {@--3@} Treachery in one's own camp; danger from one's own men or party. {@--4@} Binding, confinement; a tie or fetter. {@--5@} One's own party or army. {@--6@} One who desperately goes to fight with tigers, elephants &c.
